title: Men's 10000 m - Speed Skating Calgary 1988 Winter Olympics
table: {"0":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 10000 m 1988","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":null,"6":null,"7":null,"8":"4.","9":"5.","10":"6.","11":"7.","12":"8.","13":"9.","14":"10.","15":"11.","16":"12.","17":"13.","18":"14.","19":"15.","20":"16.","21":"17.","22":"18.","23":"19.","24":"20.","25":"21.","26":"22.","27":"23.","28":"24.","29":"25.","30":"26.","31":"27.","32":"28.","33":"29.","34":"30.","35":null,"36":null,"37":null,"38":null,"39":"Men's 10000 m - Speed Skating - Calgary 1988 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes). Skaters had to change lanes in the back straightaway of each lap in order to skate an equal distance. The skater on the outer lane had the right of way and the skater leaving the inner lane should avoid collision. The Olympic gold medal winner was the athlete with the fastest time for the race. Event facts: Men's 10000 m competition was held at the Olympic Oval and 32 athletes participated in the event.","40":null,"41":"These results for Men's 10000 m - Calgary 1988 Winter Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database","42":null},"1":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 10000 m 1988","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":"Tomas Gustafson","6":"Michael Hadschieff","7":"Leo Visser","8":"Eric Flaim","9":"Gerard Kemkers","10":"Yury Klyuyev","11":"Roberto Sighel","12":"Roland Freier","13":"Sergey Berezin","14":"Benoit Lamarche","15":"Herbert Dijkstra","16":"Joakim Karlberg","17":"Bruno Milesi","18":"David Silk","19":"Pertti Niittyll\u00e4","20":"Jiri Kyncl","21":"Timo J\u00e4rvinen","22":"Aleksandr Mozin","23":"Christian Eminger","24":"Gordon Goplen","25":"Frode Syvertsen","26":"Kim Kwan-kyu","27":"Hans van Helden","28":"Toru Aoyanagi","29":"Jeffrey Klaiber","30":"Colin Coates","31":"Hansj\u00f6rg Baltes","32":"Yoshiyuki Shimizu","33":"Lu Shuhai","34":"Julian Green","35":"Geir Karlstad","36":"Song Yong-hun","37":null,"38":null,"39":"Men's 10000 m - Speed Skating - Calgary 1988 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes).
